Package presentation

package presentation
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AudioManager
    The AudioManager class provides static methods to control background music playback within an application.
    Game
    Game crepresents the graphical user interface for the Player vs Player game.
    GameMIvsMO
    The GameMIvsMO represents the graphical user interface for the Machine vs Machine (PlantsIntelligent and ZombiesOriginal) game.
    GameMIvsMS
    GameMIvsMS represents the graphical user interface for the Machine vs Machine (PlantsIntelligent and ZombiesStrategic) game.
    GameMSvsMO
    The GameMSvsMO class represents the graphical user interface for the Machine vs Machine (PlantsStrategic and ZombiesOriginal) game.
    GameMSvsMS
    GameMSvsMS represents the graphical user interface for the Machine vs Machine (PlantsStrategic and ZombiesStrategic) game.
    GamePvsMO
    GamePvsMO represents the graphical user interface for the Player vs Machine (ZombiesOriginal) game.
    GamePvsMS
    The GamePvsMS class extends JFrame and serves as the main class for creating a game interface.
    PlantsMachines
    PlantsMachines is a GUI application class that extends JFrame.
    Select
    The Select class represents a graphical user interface for selecting game modes in the POOBvsZOMBIES application.
    Start
    The Start class represents the introductory window for the POOBvsZOMBIES application.
    ZombieMachines
    The ZombieMachines class represents the main window for the "POOBvsZOMBIES (PlantsMachines)" game.
    ZombiePlantSelector
